title: Add all 1.19 items
description: Add all new items introduced in Minecraft 1.19 (The Wild Update) including bamboo wood, cherry wood, mangrove wood, sculk blocks, mud blocks, frogs, and archaeology items

features.name: Bamboo wood set (planks, stairs, slabs, doors, signs, boats, etc.) (22 items)
Cherry wood set (logs, planks, stairs, slabs, doors, signs, boats, etc.) (18 items)
Mangrove wood set (logs, planks, stairs, slabs, doors, signs, boats, etc.) (20 items)
Hanging signs for all wood types (9 items)
Boats with chests for all wood types (7 items)
Sculk blocks (sculk, sculk catalyst, sculk shrieker, sculk vein) (4 items)
Mud and mud brick blocks (6 items)
Frog-related items (froglights, frogspawn, tadpole bucket) (6 items)
Armor trim smithing templates (16 items)
Archaeology items (brush, pottery shards, decorated pot, suspicious sand) (7 items)
New spawn eggs (allay, camel, frog, sniffer, tadpole, warden, etc.) (10 items)
Miscellaneous new items (recovery compass, goat horn, echo shard, music disc, etc.) (8 items)

title: Add Brewing Category & 1.16 Potions
description: Create a comprehensive brewing category with all potions, splash potions, lingering potions, and tipped arrows for Minecraft 1.16

features.name: Base potions (water bottle, awkward potion, mundane potion, thick potion) (4 items)
Effect potions - all variants (healing, harming, poison, regeneration, strength, etc.) (45+ items)
Splash potion variants (45+ items)
Lingering potion variants (45+ items)
Tipped arrows with all potion effects (45+ items)

title: User accounts and community features
description: Enable users to create accounts, provide feedback and suggest new features for the price guide

features.name: User registration system
User authentication/login
User profile pages
Community feedback and feature suggestions

title: Shop Manager - Your Ultimate Minecraft Trading Hub
description: Transform your Minecraft trading experience with our powerful Shop Manager! Track your competitors, maximize profits, and never miss a great deal again. Whether you're running multiple shops across different servers or just want to find the best prices, this feature puts you in control of your trading empire.

features.name: 🏪 Manage multiple shops across different Minecraft servers
📊 Compare prices instantly - see who's offering the best deals
🎯 Smart filtering by Minecraft version - only see relevant items
📦 Stock status tracking - mark when chests are full or empty
🔍 Market overview - spot profitable opportunities at a glance
⚡ Quick price updates - keep your shop competitive in seconds
🏆 Competitor tracking - monitor what other successful shops are doing
🎮 Multi-server support - manage shops on Hypixel, your SMP, and more
📱 Easy-to-use interface - no spreadsheets needed!
🎯 Advanced search and filtering - find exactly what you need
📋 Bulk operations - update hundreds of prices at once
